subCategories.title: Accessability
subCategories.description: ILIAS takes accessability seriously. Accessability guidelines presented in this section MUST be followed if new elements are added.

subCategories.title: Less
subCategories.description: ILIAS uses less as css pre-processor. This section introduces all used less variables and guidelines of less.

items.title: Colors
items.description: Color definitions to be used. In some cases

ilias.description: Total height of all three header sections

items.title: Buttons
items.description: All variables listed here are currently not used in ILIAS. Instead the Buttons are directly created via mixins and the brand-primary and brand-secondary colors.

bootstrap.title: btn-link-disabled-color
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in Bootstrap but not used, colors are injected in Button/delos.less manualy directly instead. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-font-weight
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in Bootstrap but not used. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-default-color
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in ILIAS but not used, color 'white' directly instead. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-default-border
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in ILIAS but not used, color brand-primary is used directly instead. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-default-bg
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in ILIAS but not used, color brand-primary is used directly instead. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-primary-color
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in Bootstrap but not used, color 'white' directly instead. This should be fixed.

bootstrap.title: btn-primary-bg
bootstrap.description: Implemented in variables.less in Bootstrap but not used, color brand-secondary is used directly instead. This should be fixed.

items.title: Default
items.description: Default Button in ILIAS. This is the most commonly used button instance in ILIAS and should be used, whenever there is not a good reason to use a special instance. Buttons are either of type input (with some cmd) or link (with some href).

lessVariables.title: brand-primary
lessVariables.description: Background and border color of the button. The hover-bg color is also a version (darken 10%) of this color value.

items.guiClass: ilLinkButton (ilButton), ilSubmitButton (ilButton)

items.title: Primary
items.description: According to Emphasized Buttons for Primary Action 'Buttons for a common and important next action that tend to be overlooked, should get a special emphasized style'. This style is currently named as 'Primary Button'. There should only be one 'Primary Button' per page and each use must be confirmed by the JF. In Toolbars primary actions will be sticky, meaning they will not be disappear in the responsive view.

lessVariables.title: brand-secondary
lessVariables.description: Background and border color of the button. The hover-bg color is also a version (darken 10%) of this color value

items.guiClass: ilLinkButton (ilButton), ilSubmitButton (ilButton)

items.title: Disabled
items.description: If an action is temporarily not available, actions (buttons) might be disabled. Only disable actions that can be enabled by some action of the user. If they are not available due to some setting, do not display them.
items.guiClass: ilLinkButton (ilButton), ilSubmitButton (ilButton)

subCategories.title: Main Structure
subCategories.description: Main skeleton of the ILIAS Dom structure

items.title: Overview
items.description: The main layout of the ILIAS Page contains three sections: the header section, the content section and the footer section
items.guiClass: GUI Class that the new item uses
items.knownUses: Knonwn uses of the new item

items.title: Overview
items.description: Overview of the ILIAS header area

lessVariables.description: Total height of all three header sections

lessVariables.description: Total height of all three header sections in the responsive view

lessVariables.description: Background color of the header section

items.guiClass: Todo

items.title: Branding
items.description: The branding area SHOULD contain the logo of the application and its title.
items.guiClass: Todo

items.title: Main Menu
items.description: The main menu handles the main navigation in ILIAS.
items.guiClass: Todo

items.title: Top Nav
items.description: The Top Nav area holds links and dropdowns for search, user specific action such as logout/login, settings, mail etc. It should be placed at the top right of the screen
items.guiClass: Todo

items.title: Overview
items.description: The content section is devided into a left and right sidebar and the center content. Between those ist empty space. Important, the current example is only a very raw draft. JS logic is done by the UI-Kitchen-Sink via angularJS. The example presented bellow is therefore only static. See the sidebars of the Kitchen-Sink for a working example
